author: tabish
msg: Adding in unit tests for the State Tracker to try and help find some bugs and make platform testing easier.

author: gbrown
msg: Add methods to BrowserApplicationContext to facilitate Pivot/DOM communication; update TextInput APIs for consistency with newer TextArea APIs; ensure that both TextInput and TextArea fire controller events when model data changes.

author: reinhard
msg: Add a WildcardBeanMap that extends BeanMap but checks for a wildcard expression instead of the bean type.

author: reinhard
msg: I suppose that the SettingsBeanFactoryPostProcessor can be used outside of web applications too. So don't rely on having a servlet context.
